channel.title: Fantasy Footballers - Fantasy Football Podcast
channel.copyright: 2014-2022 Engaging Media LLC, The Fantasy Footballers
channel.description: Fantasy Football at its very best. Say goodbye to the talking heads of the Fantasy Football world and hello to The Fantasy Footballers. The expert trio of Andy Holloway, Jason Moore, and Mike "The Fantasy Hitman" Wright break down the world of Fantasy Football with astute analysis, strong opinions, and matchup-winning advice you can't get anywhere else. A high quality and entertaining show that will win you your league -- in style. The ONE Fantasy Football Podcast you can't leave off your roster.

item.title: Week 9 Matchups + Jason Melts, Wheel of Shame - Fantasy Football Podcast for 11/4
item.description:
Week 9 let’s go! On today’s fantasy football podcast, a number of Week 9 matchup previews and injury updates. Plus, a recap of the Thursday night game, and Jason spins the Wheel of Shame during the “Fantasy Faceoff” segment! Manage your redraft, keeper, and dynasty fantasy football teams with the #1 fantasy football podcast. -- Fantasy Football Podcast for November 4th, 2022.

item.title: Trade-a-palooza + Ride or Die, TNF Breakdown - Fantasy Football Podcast for 11/2
item.description:
NFL Trade News! On today’s fantasy football podcast, reactions to the NFL Trade Deadline! Andy, Mike, and Jason discuss which players gained and lost fantasy value after the big trades. Plus, a preview of Thursday Night Football between the Eagles and Texans, and a new edition of “Ride or Die!” Manage your redraft, keeper, and dynasty fantasy football teams with the #1 fantasy football podcast. -- Fantasy Football Podcast for November 2nd, 2022.

Get ready for Week 4! On today’s fantasy football podcast, we discuss fantasy football player performances through three weeks: are they trending or ending? Is Austin Ekeler done? Can you count on Deebo Samuel being a WR1? Plus a preview of Thursday Night Football and a new edition of “Ride or Die!” Manage your redraft, keeper, and dynasty fantasy football teams with the #1 fantasy football podcast. -- Fantasy Football Podcast for September 28th, 2022.

item.description:

item.title: Buy or Sell + TNF Preview, Business Decisions - Fantasy Football Podcast for 10/6
item.description:
The Fantasy Footballers are back with a new episode headed into Week 5! On today’s fantasy football podcast, a number of tough fantasy lineup questions and answers! What to do with Allen Robinson and Robert Woods? Plus, the Week 5 edition of Buy or Sell, and a preview of an exciting Thursday Night Football matchup between the Rams vs Seahawks. Manage your redraft, keeper, and dynasty fantasy football teams with the #1 fantasy football podcast -- Fantasy Football Podcast for October 6th, 2021.
(5:30) - Buy or Sell (12:50) - NFL News (23:00) - Mailbag (23:30) - Allen Robinson or Laviska Shenault? (29:05) - Trade CeeDee Lamb? (32:25) - 49ers backfield (38:00) - David Montgomery (39:05) - Trade Deebo Samuel for Calvin Ridley? (43:00) - Najee Harris or Nick Chubb rest of season? The Fantasy Footballers are back with a new episode! On today’s fantasy football podcast, Andy, Mike, and Jason dive back into the divisional breakdowns with the NFC South! Get a fantasy football outlook for the Saints, Buccaneers, Panthers, and Falcons. Plus, the latest NFL News, and ideal FAAB waiver settings for your league. Manage your redraft, keeper, and dynasty fantasy football teams with the #1 fantasy football podcast. -- Fantasy Football Podcast for July 20th, 2021.

 

Dominate your fantasy football draft with the 2021 Ultimate Draft Kit -- get the Draft Analyzer with the UDK+

 

(05:30) - Quick Question - FAAB Waiver Settings

(08:40) - NFL News (Saquon Barkley)

(15:45) - NFC South

(16:05) - New Orleans Saints

(30:00) - Tampa Bay Buccaneers

(42:25) - Carolina Panthers

(49:45) - Atlanta Falcons
